features: ADVANCE EYE NUTRITION: UpNourish AREDS 2+ is a scientifically formulated, high-quality eye vitamin supplement designed to provide comprehensive care and support for adults concerned about their eye health*

MACULAR HEALTH SUPPORT: With key ingredients like Lutein, Zeaxanthin, and Astaxanthin, this supplement that forms a protective layer that absorbs harmful lights, promoting long-term macular health and visual function.
OPTIC NERVE & RETINA PROTECTION: The powerful combination of nutrients in this formula supports the health of your optic nerve and retina, crucial for maintaining clear and sharp vision*

ENHANCED VISUAL PERFORMANCE: By reducing eye strain, promoting better visual acuity, and supporting night vision, this supplement helps improve overall visual performance, especially during demanding tasks or prolonged screen time*

PREMIUM FORMULATION FOR ADULTS: Developed by medical professionals, this supplement provides targeted eye care for adults, including seniors, supporting healthy aging, reducing the effects of dryness, and promoting optimal eye comfort*

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: When it comes to your eye health, there's no room for compromise. That's why UpNourish presents a breakthrough formula designed to address multiple aspects of eye care. With a focus on macular health, dry eye relief, eye strain reduction, eye pressure management, and improved night vision, UpNourish AREDS 2 Eye Vitamins are the ultimate support for your eyes' well-being*. UpNourish AREDS 2 Eye Vitamins provide optimal support for your eye health. Our carefully selected ingredients, including Lutein, Zeaxanthin, Saffron, Astaxanthin, and DHA, work in perfect harmony to nourish and protect your eyes from the challenges of modern life*.

Our innovative formula contains a synergistic blend of nutrients carefully chosen to nourish and protect your precious eyes. The comprehensive support starts with an optimal dosage of Lutein, a powerful carotenoid that promotes macular health, shields against harmful blue light, and contributes to clear vision. By incorporating Lutein into your eye care regimen, you provide your eyes with the nourishment they need to maintain clear vision and reduce the risk of age-related conditions.*Working alongside Lutein,Zeaxanthin is another key carotenoid known for its ability to filter damaging light, these two superheroes work in harmony to safeguard your vision.

But the benefits don't stop there. We understand the challenges of dry eyes, eye strain, and eye pressure that can accompany our modern lifestyles. That's why we've included ingredients specifically chosen to address these concerns. Saffron, a treasured spice, contains powerful antioxidants and bioactive compounds that benefit eye health. It helps promote optimal blood flow to the retina, supporting overall eye function and reducing the risk of eye conditions*. Saffron's properties also contribute to a soothing effect, alleviating dry eyes and promoting comfort.

Astaxanthin, a natural pigment found in certain marine organisms, boasts exceptional antioxidant properties. By neutralizing free radicals and reducing oxidative stress, Astaxanthin helps protect the delicate structures of the eyes from damage caused by environmental factors and aging. Its potent antioxidant effects further support eye health and alleviate discomfort*.

Docosahexaenoic acid (DHA), an omega-3 fatty acid, plays a crucial role in maintaining optimal retinal health. It is a vital component of the retina and contributes to its structural integrity. By including DHA in UpNourish Eye Vitamins, we provide the necessary building blocks for healthy retinal function, promoting visual acuity and protecting against degenerative conditions.

By harnessing the power of these exceptional ingredients, UpNourish AREDS 2 Eye Vitamins deliver a comprehensive approach to eye care. Incorporating UpNourish into your daily routine, you can experience a range of benefits. Say farewell to eye strain and pressure. Enhance your vision, allowing you to navigate the daily routine with ease. Rest easy knowing that your macular health is receiving the support it needs to thrive. UpNourish is not just another eye supplement. It is the culmination of years of research, a blend of nature's wonders, and a testament to our dedication to providing you with the best eye care possible.See the world through new eyes with UpNourish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I buy it for my friend overseas because she has a problem in her eyes it’s very useful and great for her eyes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It seems like overnight, the minute I turned 40, my vision has drastically gotten worse. My eye doctor suggested a supplement for eye health. I purchased from UpNourish as I take several of their other supplements and have been very pleased. These are gel tabs and are not small by any means but are easy to swallow. No taste. I didn’t expect to notice a drastic change after just 2 weeks taking them but I swear that my eyes look healthier and have a youthful luster to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its very nicely packaged and the capsules are easy to swallow. Im in it for the long haul, because I dont like the impact aging has on my vision. Only time will tell, how well this product works. I really like this product because in addition to eye nutrition it has all the c, & e for the day plus fish oil. So far for me its a WIN!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I actually have noticed better eyesight since taking this vitamin supplement but wish gel capsules were smaller as a 70+ woman sometimes large capsules almost get stuck at swallowing even with lotsa water. Overall good product and fair value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Research shows these are good ingredients for your eyes and the rest of you.
reviews.reviewText: Only wish it was less expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My eyes are much less dry. Good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My doctor recommended this vitamin for my eyes and I am pleased

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are on the bigger side, but not to bad to swallow. I find these work great for keeping my eye pressure down, and have the same ingredients as AReds from the store..I have a spot in the center of my left eye that was distorting my vision, these have help lessen that distortion some, not totally, but some what...
